mapper.insert: insert into t_merchant_info (ID, business_name, merchant_name, merchant_desc,merchant_operator, merchant_phone,merchant_address,remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_merchant_info set business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_desc = #{merchantDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_operator = #{merchantOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_phone = #{merchantPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_address =#{merchantAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_merchant_info set merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_desc = #{merchantDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_operator = #{merchantOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_phone = #{merchantPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_address =#{merchantAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where business_name = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, business_name, merchant_name, merchant_desc,merchant_operator, merchant_phone,merchant_address,remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_merchant_info where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, business_name, merchant_name, merchant_desc,merchant_operator, merchant_phone,merchant_address,remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_merchant_info

select ID, business_name, merchant_name, merchant_desc,merchant_operator, merchant_phone,merchant_address,remark, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_merchant_info where merchant_desc like '%' || #{merchantDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
